property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Muskets gave the Alaborn army an advantage it had long lacked - air defense.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I dedicate my body to my country And my life to my King." - Alaborn Soldier's Oath

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +1/+1 as long as you control no nonartifact, nonwhite creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target artifact creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Through years of study and training, the Blacksmiths of Argive became adept at reassembling the mangled remains of the strange, mechanical creatures abounding in their native land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "‘O miserable of happy! Is this the end Of this new glorious world . . . ?'" - John Milton, Paradise Lost

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player chooses a number of lands they control equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast this spell only during combat before blockers are declared. Target creature defending player controls can block any number of creatures this turn. It blocks each attacking creature this turn if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Champion Lancer by creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The flash of his lance projects the pure radiance of his honor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Conversion unless you pay {W}{W}. All Mountains are Plains.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact. You gain life equal to its mana value.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All this nonsense made by mages Rusts and crumbles through the ages." - Aline Corralurn, "Inheritance"

property.name: Rules
property.value: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, instead that source deals that much damage to you and Eye for an Eye deals that much damage to that source's controller.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast this spell only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. This turn, whenever an attacking creature deals combat damage to you, it deals that much damage to its controller.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Target player gains 3 life. • Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you would draw a card during your draw step, instead you may skip that draw. If you do, until your next turn, you can't be attacked except by creatures with flying and/or islandwalk.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast this spell only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Destroy target attacking creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Artifacts, creatures, and lands your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Make people wait for what they want, and you have power over them. This is as true for merchants and militia as it is for cooks and couples." - Gwendlyn Di Corci

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player loses all poison counters. Leeches deals that much damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Where our potions and powders fail, perhaps nature will succeed." - Reyhan, Samite Alchemist

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile all white creatures. For each creature exiled this way, its controller draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is only fitting that one such as I should die in pursuit of knowledge." - Vervamon the Elder

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as Martyrs of Korlis is untapped, all damage that would be dealt to you by artifacts is dealt to Martyrs of Korlis instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of each end step, if a creature died this turn, put a carrion counter on Osai Vultures. Remove two carrion counters from Osai Vultures: Osai Vultures gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Personal Incarnation this turn is dealt to its owner instead. Only Personal Incarnation's owner may activate this ability. When Personal Incarnation dies, its owner loses half their life, rounded up.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bravery shines brightest in a pure soul.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The traditional kings of the jungle command a healthy respect in other climates as well. Relying mainly on their stealth and speed, Savannah Lions can take a victim by surprise, even in the endless flat plains of their homeland.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Born with wings of light and a sword of faith, this heavenly incarnation embodies both fury and purity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Serra, like Feroz, is long since dead. But remember, Daria: her spirit shall survive so long as the Homelands do." - Taysir

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Serra Bestiary unless you pay {W}{W}. Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities with {T} in their costs can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the cat flies and the bird stalks, guard your horses carefully.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature. Activate only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You idiots! Turn it around! Turn it around!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Temple Acolyte enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Young, yes. Inexperienced, yes. Weak? Don't count on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as Veteran Bodyguard is untapped, all damage that would be dealt to you by unblocked creatures is dealt to Veteran Bodyguard instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Good bodyguards are hard to find, mainly because they don't live long.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Protection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Out of the blackness and stench of the engulfing swamp emerged a shimmering figure. Only the splattered armor and ichor-stained sword hinted at the unfathomable evil the knight had just laid waste.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, first strike {W}{W}: Wild Aesthir gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "High in the Karplusans, death is swift and razor-clawed." - Arna Kennerüd, skycaptain

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Two little goblins, out in the sun. Down came a griffin, and then there was one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: These spirits of the air are winsome and wild and cannot be truly contained. Only marginally intelligent, they often substitute whimsy for strategy, delighting in mischief and mayhem.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant artifact As long as enchanted artifact isn't a creature, it's an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its mana value.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Counter target red spell. • Destroy target red permanent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Cloud Dragon can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Cloud Spirit can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Copy Artifact enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact on the battlefield, except it's an enchantment in addition to its other types.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player activates a mana ability of each land they control. Then that player loses all unspent mana and you add the mana lost this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: We asked Captain Soll what became of the Serafina, but all he said was, "Ships that go down shouldn't come back up."

property.name: Rules
property.value: All artifacts have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this artifact unless you pay {2}."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Giant Tortoise gets +0/+3 as long as it's untapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts an instant spell, counter it unless that player pays {X}, where X is its mana value.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Of royal blood amongst the spirits of the air, the Mahamoti Djinn rides on the wings of the winds. As dangerous in the gambling hall as he is in battle, he is a master of trickery and misdirection.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures lose flying and islandwalk.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Curse Reveka, and curse her coddled conjurers. Their sorcerers' school shall yet be ours." - Irini Sengir

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Owl Familiar enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Phantasmal Forces unless you pay {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: These beings embody the essence of true heroes long dead. Summoned from the dreamrealms, they rise to meet their enemies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land As Phantasmal Terrain enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type. Enchanted land is the chosen type.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant artifact Enchanted artifact's activated abilities cost {2} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the mana in that cost to less than one mana.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Occasionally a member of the Institute of Arcane Study acquires a taste for worldly pleasures. Seldom do they have trouble finding employment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tedious research made the Sages of the College of Lat-Nam adept in repairing broken artifacts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sea Serpent can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Sea Serpent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Legend has it that Serpents used to be bigger, but how could that be?

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a land. If you sacrifice an Island this way, Serendib Djinn deals 3 damage to you. When you control no lands, sacrifice Serendib Djinn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to activate abilities of artifacts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Players skip their untap steps. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Stasis unless you pay {U}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ". . . inviting the soul to wander for a spell in abysses of solitude . . . ." - Kate Chopin, The Awakening

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Draw a card. Activate only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From time, knowledge. From knowledge, power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Energy is never lost, only transformed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Thing from the Deep attacks, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice an Island.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Seafarers fear sailing off the world's edge not so much as down its gullet.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice an artifact. If you do, search your library for an artifact card. If that card's mana value is less than or equal to the sacrificed artifact's mana value, put it onto the battlefield. If it's greater, you may pay {X}, where X is the difference. If you do, put it onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. Then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unpredictable as the sea itself, water elementals shift without warning from tranquility to tempest. Capricious and fickle, they flow restlessly from one shape to another, expressing their moods with their physical forms.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Protection from white (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything white.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Battle doesn't need a purpose; the battle is its own purpose. You don't ask why a plague spreads or a field burns. Don't ask why I fight.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Cyclopean Mummy dies, exile it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dakmor Plague deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The tiniest cough can be deadlier than the fiercest dragon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Destroy target land. At the beginning of your upkeep, unless you pay {B}{B}{B}, tap Demonic Hordes and sacrifice a land of an opponent's choice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Created to destroy Dominiaria, demons can sometimes be bent to a more focused purpose.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Dread Reaper enters the battlefield, you lose 5 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At end of combat, put a paralyzation counter on each creature blocking or blocked by Dread Wight and tap those creatures. Each of those creatures doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as it has a paralyzation counter on it. Each of those creatures gains "{4}: Remove a paralyzation counter from this creature."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Ebon Dragon enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent discard a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Foul Spirit enters the battlefield, sacrifice a land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target artifact. Activate only during your upkeep and only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The warm rain of grease on my face immediately made it clear I had entered Phyrexia." - Jarsyl, Diary

property.name: Rules
property.value: White spells cost {3} more to cast. Activated abilities of white enchantments cost {3} more to activate.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature can't be regenerated this turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as Guardian Beast is untapped, noncreature artifacts you control can't be enchanted, they have indestructible, and other players can't gain control of them. This effect doesn't remove Auras already attached to those artifacts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Hasran Ogress attacks, it deals 3 damage to you unless you pay {2}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Junún Efreet unless you pay {B}{B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Lich enters the battlefield, you lose life equal to your life total. You don't lose the game for having 0 or less life. If you would gain life, draw that many cards instead. Whenever you're dealt damage, sacrifice that many nontoken permanents. If you can't, you lose the game. When Lich is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you lose the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Lim-Dûl's Cohort blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, that creature can't be regenerated this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, Minion of Tevesh Szat deals 2 damage to you unless you pay {B}{B}. {T}: Target creature gets +3/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A minion given over to Tevesh Szat is a stronger minion gained." - Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures target opponent controls. Draw a card for each creature destroyed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prowling Nightstalker can't be blocked except by black creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Silent as a serpent, twisted as a lone bog tree, evil as Tojira's heart.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures target opponent controls. You lose 2 life for each creature destroyed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Knives in the sky, cries in the air, and blood on the ground.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each end step, put a corpse counter on Scavenging Ghoul for each creature that died this turn. Remove a corpse counter from Scavenging Ghoul: Regenerate Scavenging Ghoul.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Soul Shred deals 3 damage to target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant artifact At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted artifact's controller, Warp Artifact deals 1 damage to that player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy two target nonblack creatures. You lose 5 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at target opponent's hand and choose a card from it. You control that player until Word of Command finishes resolving. The player plays that card if able. While doing so, the player can activate mana abilities only if they're from lands that player controls and only if mana they produce is spent to activate other mana abilities of lands the player controls and/or to play that card. If the chosen card is cast as a spell, you control the player while that spell is resolving.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Until your next upkeep, target noncreature artifact becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its mana value.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Zombie creatures have swampwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) Other Zombies have "{B}: Regenerate this permanent."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They say the Zombie Master controlled these foul creatures even before his own death, but now that he is one of them, nothing can make them betray him.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}{R}, {T}: Gain control of target artifact for as long as you control Aladdin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first line of defense against Urza and Mishra, the Artifact Blast achieved widespread fame until an unlucky mage discovered it was useless on the devices the brothers had already created.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice an artifact: Atog gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Four things that never meet do here unite To shed my blood and to ravage my heart, A radiant brow and tresses that beguile And rosy cheeks and a glittering smile." - The Arabian Nights, trans. Haddawy

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact with mana value X. It can't be regenerated. Detonate deals X damage to that artifact's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is much talk about the art of creation. What about the art of destruction?

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Fire Imp enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fire Tempest deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Copy target instant or sorcery spell, except that the copy is red. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's easy to stand head and shoulders over those with no backbone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They get along so well with their goats because they're practically goats themselves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land As long as enchanted land is a basic Mountain, Goblin creatures get +0/+2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Goblin Firestarter: It deals 1 damage to any target. Activate only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Goblin General attacks, Goblin creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lead, follow, or run like crazy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land As long as enchanted land is a basic Mountain, Goblin creatures get +1/+0. When Goblin Shrine leaves the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each Goblin creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{R}, Sacrifice two Goblins: Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Goblins bred underground, their numbers hidden from the enemy until it was too late." - Sarpadian Empires, vol. IV

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast this spell only during combat before blockers are declared. All creatures gain menace until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Take an extra turn after this one. At the beginning of that turn's end step, you lose the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Mijae Djinn attacks, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, remove Mijae Djinn from combat and tap it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Three little goblins, enjoying their brew. One bumped an ogre, and then there were two.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Orcish Mechanics deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {1}{R} and/or {1}{G} any number of times. Destroy target artifact. For each additional {1}{R} you paid, destroy another target artifact. For each additional {1}{G} you paid, destroy another target artifact, and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Counter target blue spell. • Destroy target blue permanent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rock Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. For each 1 damage that would be dealt to Rock Hydra, if it has a +1/+1 counter on it, remove a +1/+1 counter from it and prevent that 1 damage. {R}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Rock Hydra this turn. {R}{R}{R}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Rock Hydra. Activate only during your upkeep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rockslide Ambush deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sedge Troll gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Swamp. {B}: Regenerate Sedge Troll.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The stench in the hovel was overpowering; something loathsome was cooking. Occasionally something surfaced in the thick paste, but my host would casually push it down before I could make out what it was.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While it's true most Dragons are cruel, the Shivan Dragon seems to take particular glee in the misery of others, often tormenting its victims much like a cat plays with a mouse before delivering the final blow.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Players can't untap more than one creature during their untap steps.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Thunder Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to each creature without flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Two-Headed Giant of Foriys can block an additional creature each combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No earthly armor is protection against this sweetness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Argothian Pixies can't be blocked by artifact creatures. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Argothian Pixies by artifact creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Argothian Treefolk by artifact sources.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bee Sting deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Busy as a bumblebee, blistered as a goblin. - Alaborn saying

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, any time you could activate a mana ability, you may pay 1 life. If you do, add {C}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent casts an artifact spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Citanul Druid.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact. It can't be regenerated. That artifact's controller gains life equal to its mana value.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a wind counter on Cyclone, then sacrifice Cyclone unless you pay {G} for each wind counter on it. If you pay, Cyclone deals damage equal to the number of wind counters on it to each creature and each player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Deathcoil Wurm assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy the creature with the least power. It can't be regenerated. If two or more creatures are tied for least power, you choose one of them. When there are no creatures on the battlefield, sacrifice Drop of Honey.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hear that? No? That's a cat warrior."

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may play any number of lands on each of your turns. Whenever you play a land, if it wasn't the first land you played this turn, Fastbond deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) At the beginning of your upkeep, Force of Nature deals 8 damage to you unless you pay {G}{G}{G}{G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gaea's Avenger's power and toughness are each equal to 1 plus the number of artifacts your opponents control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can attack as though it had haste. {0}: Untap enchanted creature. Activate only during your turn and only once each turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ironhoof Ox can't be blocked by more than one creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The good news is it's vegetarian. The bad news is it just doesn't like you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land When enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy it. That land's controller may attach Kudzu to a land of their choice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All Forests are 1/1 creatures that are still lands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature loses flying until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sandstorm deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the landscape turned against Sarsour, first rising up and pelting him, then rearranging itself so he could no longer find his way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.) {2}{G}, {T}: Unless an opponent pays {2}, gain control of target artifact for as long as Scarwood Bandits remains on the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Scavenger Folk: Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While defending their southern borders, both the Wu and Shu kingdoms fought against the barbarians' trained elephants.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Squall deals 2 damage to each creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To-night the winds begin to rise . . . The rooks are blown about the skies . . . ." - Alfred, Lord Tennyson, In Memoriam

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each noncreature artifact loses all abilities and becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its mana value. If Titania's Song leaves the battlefield, this effect continues until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's hard to say for certain which end is more dangerous.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It has the run of the swamps, and it knows it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Wood Elemental enters the battlefield, sacrifice any number of untapped Forests. Wood Elemental's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests sacrificed as it entered the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sacrilege! A noble ally in life, made nothing more than a glorified kite in death!" - Arna Kennerüd, skycaptain

property.name: Rules
property.value: {5}, {T}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by attacking creatures without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Al-abara simply laughed and lifted one finger, and the carpet carried her high out of our reach.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Target permanent you control becomes the color of your choice. +lt;I+gt;(This effect lasts indefinitely.)+lt;/I+gt;

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Among the first allies Urza gained were the people of Kroog. As a sign of friendship, Urza gave the healers of the city potent amulets; afterwards, thousands journeyed to Kroog in hope of healing, greatly adding to the city's glory.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a doom counter on Armageddon Clock. At the beginning of your draw step, Armageddon Clock deals damage equal to the number of doom counters on it to each player. {4}: Remove a doom counter from Armageddon Clock. Any player may activate this ability but only during any upkeep step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Basalt Monolith doesn't untap during your untap step. {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}. {3}: Untap Basalt Monolith.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Sacrifice Bottle of Suleiman: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, create a 5/5 colorless Djinn artifact creature token with flying. If you lose the flip, Bottle of Suleiman deals 5 damage to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Brass Man doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {1}. If you do, untap Brass Man.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample As long as you control another creature, prevent all damage that would be dealt to Bronze Horse by spells that target it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tawnos learned quickly from Urza that utter simplicity often led to wondrous, yet subtle utility.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Target creature you control gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Its controller sacrifices it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So great is its power, only the chosen can wield it and live." - Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tawnos won fame as Urza's greatest assistant. After he created these warriors, Urza ended his apprenticeship, promoting him directly to the rank of master.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Clockwork Avian enters the battlefield with four +1/+0 counters on it. At end of combat, if Clockwork Avian attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it. {X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Avian. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Avian to be greater than four. Activate only during your upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Until I came to the Floating Isle, I never had to oil the servants." - Baki, wizard attendant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Clockwork Swarm enters the battlefield with four +1/+0 counters on it. Clockwork Swarm can't be blocked by Walls. At end of combat, if Clockwork Swarm attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it. {X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Swarm. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Swarm to be greater than four. Activate only during your upkeep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Colossus of Sardia doesn't untap during your untap step. {9}: Untap Colossus of Sardia. Activate only during your upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Buried under a thin layer of dirt, it was known for centuries as Mount Sardia.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, Discard a card at random: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Put a mire counter on target non-Swamp land. That land is a Swamp for as long as it has a mire counter on it. Activate only during your upkeep. When Cyclopean Tomb is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, at the beginning of each of your upkeeps for the rest of the game, remove all mire counters from a land that a mire counter was put onto with Cyclopean Tomb but that a mire counter has not been removed from with Cyclopean Tomb.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The bolts of our ballistae smashed into the monstrous thing, but our hopes died in our chests as its gears continued turning." - Sevti Mukul, The Fall of Alsoor

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}: Dragon Engine gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who believed the city of Kroog would never fall to Mishra's forces severely underestimated the might of his war machines.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Untap target attacking creature you control. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That Rhino would fetch us a tidy sum, Joven. Perhaps it's time to make it ours." - Chandler

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Viscerid dams may be of living creatures as well as bones and mud.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Red creatures get +1/+1. Whenever a Mountain is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {R}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Grapeshot Catapult deals 1 damage to target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For years scholars debated whether these were Urza's or Mishra's creations. Recent research suggests they were invented by the brothers' original master, Tocasia, and that both used these devices.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target creature this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {X}, {T}: You may exile a nonland card from your hand. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled. Put a charge counter on Ice Cauldron and note the type and amount of mana spent to pay this activation cost. Activate only if there are no charge counters on Ice Cauldron. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Ice Cauldron: Add Ice Cauldron's last noted type and amount of mana. Spend this mana only to cast the last card exiled with Ice Cauldron.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature this turn, that source deals that damage to you instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Juggernaut attacks each combat if able. Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: We had taken refuge in a small cave, thinking the entrance was too narrow for it to follow. To our horror, its gigantic head smashed into the mountainside, ripping itself a new entrance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All Swamps are 1/1 black creatures that are still lands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You have no maximum hand size. If an effect causes you to discard a card, discard it, but you may put it on top of your library instead of into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {1}: Regenerate Living Wall.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some fiendish mage had created a horrifying wall of living flesh, patched together from a jumble of still-recognizable body parts. As we sought to hew our way through it, some unknown power healed the gaping wounds we cut, denying us passage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instant and enchantment spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Vault doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {4}. If you do, untap Mana Vault. At the beginning of your draw step, if Mana Vault is tapped, it deals 1 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While exploring the sacred cave of Koilos with his brother Mishra and their master Tocasia, Urza fell behind in the Hall of Tagsin, where he discovered the remarkable Mightstone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cumulative upkeep {3} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) If tapped for mana, Plains produce {R}, Islands produce {G}, Swamps produce {W}, Mountains produce {U}, and Forests produce {B} instead of any other type.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {6}, {T}: Return target permanent you both own and control to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Battle of Tomakul taught Urza not to rely on fickle reinforcements.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The foot stone is connected to the ankle stone, the ankle stone is connected to the leg stone . . ." - "Song of the Artificer"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Onulet dies, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An early inspiration for Urza, Tocasia's Onulets contained magical essences that could be cannibalized after they stopped functioning.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}, {T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Take this item, for instance. How would it destroy us, Relicbane?" - Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creature spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nireya reached through the Gate, sensing the energies trapped beyond.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Primal Clay enters the battlefield, it becomes your choice of a 3/3 artifact creature, a 2/2 artifact creature with flying, or a 1/6 Wall artifact creature with defender in addition to its other types. (A creature with defender can't attack.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. Return Rakalite to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza was the first to understand that the war would not be lost for lack of power, but for lack of troops.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {5}, {T}: Discard a card at random, then draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the uninitiated, the Ring of Renewal is merely an oddity. For those fluent in the wielding of magic, however, it is a source of great knowledge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {6}, {T}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There was more malice in its button eyes than should have been possible in something that had never known life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Shapeshifter enters the battlefield, choose a number between 0 and 7. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may choose a number between 0 and 7. Shapeshifter's power is equal to the last chosen number and its toughness is equal to 7 minus that number.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Soldevi Golem doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may untap target tapped creature an opponent controls. If you do, untap Soldevi Golem.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Slow and steady wins the race.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though Mishra was impressed by the staves Ashnod had created for Zegon's defense, he understood they only hinted at her full potential.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Originally considered the work of Urza, this tablet was created by forgers seeking to imitate Urza's masterpieces.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may choose not to untap Tawnos's Weaponry during your untap step. {2}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 for as long as Tawnos's Weaponry remains tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Urza's war machines became too costly, Tawnos's weaponry replaced them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Tetravus enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may remove any number of +1/+1 counters from Tetravus. If you do, create that many 1/1 colorless Tetravite artifact creature tokens. They each have flying and "This creature can't be enchanted." At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile any number of tokens created with Tetravus. If you do, put that many +1/+1 counters on Tetravus.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Time Vault enters the battlefield tapped. Time Vault doesn't untap during your untap step. If you would begin your turn while Time Vault is tapped, you may skip that turn instead. If you do, untap Time Vault. {T}: Take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Put a hatchling counter on Triassic Egg. Sacrifice Triassic Egg: Choose one. Activate only if there are two or more hatchling counters on Triassic Egg. • You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. • Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts an artifact spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When sorely wounded or tired, Urza would often retreat to the workshops of his apprentices. They were greatly amazed at how much better he looked each time he took a sip of water.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, if it wasn't sacrificed, you may pay {3}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as it's your turn, creatures you control get +2/+0. As long as it's not your turn, creatures you control get -0/-2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Unearthly and invisible fibers emanate from this sphere, entangling all who draw near." - Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

property.name: Flavor
property.value: During the brothers' childhood, Tocasia took them to explore the sacred cave of Koilos. There, in the Hall of Tagsin, Mishra discovered the mysterious weakstone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After Kroog was destroyed while most of its defenders were at his side, Urza vowed that none of his allies would ever need to fear for their own defense again, even while laying siege to a city far from their homes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever City of Brass becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to you. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Draw a card. Activate only if you have exactly seven cards in hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though he eventually came to despise Tocasia, Mishra listened well to her lessons on clarity of purpose. Unlike his brother, he focused his mind on a single goal.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice Strip Mine: Destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unlike previous conflicts, the war between Urza and Mishra made Dominia itself a casualty of war.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Power-Plant and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mines became common as cities during the days of the artificers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Power-Plant and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mines became common as cities during the days of the artificers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Power-Plant and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mines became common as cities during the days of the artificers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Power-Plant and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mines became common as cities during the days of the artificers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Power-Plant, add {C}{C}{C} instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza always put Tocasia's lessons on resource-gathering to effective use.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Power-Plant, add {C}{C}{C} instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza always put Tocasia's lessons on resource-gathering to effective use.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Power-Plant, add {C}{C}{C} instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza always put Tocasia's lessons on resource-gathering to effective use.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Power-Plant, add {C}{C}{C} instead.

property.value: Urza always put Tocasia's lessons on resource-gathering to effective use.
